name: Twentytwelve-less
tagline: WordPress twentytwelve child theme using LESS CSS
body:
### Twentytwelve WordPress Child Theme using LESS CSS
## Simple Twentytwelve WordPress child theme using LESS.

Based on the demo code used for the WordPress NYC Meetup Presentation on 3/18/2014:
[Better WordPress Style: Using SASS and LESS CSS Preprocessors](http://www.meetup.com/WordPressNYC/events/169583212/)

Yes, it's a 90s style theme, complete with gradients and box shadows, in lovely shades of green. :)

### Authors and Contributors
It's just me for now: (@gmlevit). Hope others contribute too.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
